txt.en: You have been tasked with finding a way into a recently uncovered dwarf-vault in Gundabad.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have just recently uncovered a lost treasure vault. The ancient treasure hoard is sealed and untouched. What puzzles the dwarves who discovered it is there seems to be no way to open the vault.

'I ask you to travel to the vault of Agbash-khalt and find a way to open the vault. We cannot allow Agbash-khalt to be discovered and plundered by anyone else! For Gundabad!'

Behold! The vault of Agbash-khalt, sealed and hidden to all those who have occupied Gundabad, has now finally revealed itself to the Zhélruka Dwarves….\n\nYour mission is to find a way into a recently uncovered dwarf-vault in Gundabad.
A puzzling device prevents you from retrieving what you are after and must be solved.
Your mission is to find a way into a recently uncovered dwarf-vault in Gundabad.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel.
'The vault has been opened?! With our scouts guarding Agbash-khalt, we will soon find out what treasures lie within!\n\n'You have done well, [placeholder].'
